title: New Typeface : No name
content:
Hi all!

In my leisure-time I am working on a Typeface inspired by an old lettering from a Portuguese Pharma company.  
After some search (posts here in Typophile) I found some similarities with Hubert Jocham’s Milk. But even so I decided to go on.

I would be thankful if you could take a look at it.

There are certainly some problems with some glyphs at the moment (for example I dont like the S, T, Y) The V, W, X, Y and Z also need more work...

Just need some feedback before I can go further with it...  
Thanks a lot for your help

António

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418221206im_/http:/typophile.com/files/amarantino_6434.jpg)
author: afonseca1974

comments.content:
Not sure why but image didn't upload the first time.

António

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418221206im_/http:/typophile.com/files/amarantino_3803.jpg)
For me the stumps at the bottom of the v and w are a little distracting, but I love the font, and the name is quite nice also.
